required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Abemaciclib (LY2835219) in Participants With Stage IV Squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized Phase 2 Study of Abemaciclib (LY2835219) Versus Docetaxel in Patients With Stage IV Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Previously Treated With Platinum-Based Chemotherapy

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of the study drug known as abemaciclib versus docetaxel in participants with stage IV squamous non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) previously treated with platinum-based chemotherapy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Objective Progression or Death from Any Cause (Approximately 6 Months)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Day 1 Cycle 1 through Predose Day 1 Cycle 4 (Approximately 3 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: PK: Volume of Distribution of Abemaciclib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Day 1 Cycle 1 through Predose Day 1 Cycle 4 (Approximately 3 Months)
Baseline to Date of Death from Any Cause (Approximately 11 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve Complete Response or Partial Response: Overall Response Rate (ORR)
Percentage of Participants who Exhibit Stable Disease (SD) or Confirmed Response (CR) or Partial Response (PR): Disease Control Rate (DCR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Measured Progressive Disease (Approximately 6 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Worsening of Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status
Change from Baseline in MD Anderson Symptom Inventory-Lung Cancer (MDASI-LC) Score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through End of Study (Approximately 6 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in EuroQol 5-Dimensional 5 Level (EQ-5D-5L) Questionnaire Index Score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Measured Progressive Disease (Approximately 6 Months)

clinical_study.condition: Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Stage IV

arm_group.description: Abemaciclib given orally every 12 hours on days 1 to 21 of each 21 day cycle. Participants may continue to receive treatment until discontinuation criteria are met.
Docetaxel given intravenously (IV) on day 1 of each 21 day cycle. Participants may continue to receive treatment until discontinuation criteria are met.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Confirmed diagnosis of stage IV NSCLC.
- Have progressed during or after platinum-based chemotherapy for advanced disease.
- Have not received prior treatment with docetaxel.
- Have availability of adequate formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor derived material.
- Have adequate organ function including hematology, renal, and liver.
- Have good performance score (0-1).
- Have measureable disease per RECIST 1.1.
- Agree to use a reliable medically approved method of birth control.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have received prior treatment with any cyclin dependent kinase (CDK) 4 and 6 inhibitor or participated in a clinical trial with a CDK 4 and 6 inhibitor and the treatment administered is not known.
- Are currently receiving treatment in a clinical trial involving an investigational product or non-approved use of a drug or device.
- Have the presence of unstable central nervous system (CNS) metastasis.
- Have had major surgery (excluding biopsy) < 28 days of the initial dose of study drug.
